sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.

sentences.english: Gravitation is an force effect originating from instantaneous power of fed back energy ;

sentences.english: The static switch is sized to clear most short-circuits and transient current spikes.

sentences.english: They are based on a predictive instantaneous current PWM control.

sentences.english: In this paper, an on-line monitoring device for fast transient overvoltages on substations is designed.

sentences.english: The example below combines the batch and instantaneous validation methods.

sentences.english: Most reported adverse effects were mild and transient.
sentences.chinese: 大多數報告的副反應都是輕度和瞬時的。

sentences.chinese: 在正常短路與瞬時短路兩種過程中均能產生飛濺。

sentences.english: Fuses are selected to allow passage of normal current and of excessive current only for short periods.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲的選擇允許通過正常電流和瞬時過大電流。

sentences.english: We live in a world where we’re used to instant gratification of every desire.

sentences.english: It represents the instantaneous traces of the ordinary and extraordinary wavefronts.
